acerca_de_mi__text: I'm a Fullstack web developer, passionate about Frontend ‚ù§Ô∏è. I love technology, programming, and learning new things. I like to work in a team and learn from my colleagues. I am currently studying the second track of the Certified Tech Developer career, conceived and designed by Digital House, Mercado Libre and Globant, in which I am specializing in Frontend development. I recently graduated from Professional Developer, where, with a group of colleagues, we developed a web application as the final project of the first track, in which I worked as a Frontend Developer.
contactme__text: If you are interested in working with me, or just want to say hello, do not hesitate to contact me. I will be happy to answer you! ü§ó.

projects__info.proyecto__description: Calendar App is a web application that allows you to create, edit and delete events. Just enter the date and time of the event, the title and a description. Keep track of your events and never forget anything üóì.
Personal journal web application, where notes can be viewed, edited, created or deleted. It has a login and register system. Keep your notes safe! üìù.

The Food Truck is a web application that allows you to order food. You can view the menu, add products to the cart, remove products from the cart, and place the order. It has a login and register system. Enjoy your food! üçî.
